name: Horned Devil
movement: 20 ft. walking speed, flies at 60 ft.
description: A fearsome fiendish warrior with bat-like wings, massive horns, and red, scaly skin.
memorable: It wields a spiked tail and deadly melee attacks, complemented by its ability to see through magical darkness.
goals: Serve higher devils as enforcers or generals while spreading terror.
relations: Often encountered with other devils or fiends in the Nine Hells.
environment: Primarily found in the Nine Hells or areas of conflict.
strengths: High physical strength and toughness, magical resistance, and various damaging attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to strategic magical attacks and abilities that exploit its few weaknesses.
attacks: Multiattack includes two melee Fork attacks and one Tail attack or three ranged Hurl Flame attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Inferno, dealing devastating fire damage to nearby creatures.
senses: Possesses Devil's Sight, allowing it to see through magical darkness.
skills: Notable skill proficiencies in athletics and intimidation, enhancing its capabilities in interactions and combat.
additional_information: Immune to fire and poison damage.
Can deliver venomous strikes with its Tail attack.
Uses terrifying magical abilities to control the battlefield.
Can grapple attackers who miss with melee attacks.
Known for its loyalty to the infernal hierarchy and desire for chaos.
spellcasting: Can use spells and magical abilities, including Hurl Flame to deal damage at range.
test_queries: tall red skinned fiend with wings
brutal devil with a spiked tail
fiend that can see through darkness
large infernal warrior that spreads terror
